msg.msgText: Destination mapping rule {0}. Queue manager connection {1}. Unable to get PCF response from WebSphere MQ temporary dynamic reply queue {2}. MQGET Reason {3}.

msgExplanation.p: A failure occurred while attempting to get a PCF response from a WebSphere MQ temporary dynamic reply queue. MQRC_NO_MSG_AVAILABLE might indicate that the command server is not running on the WebSphere MQ queue manager.

msgUserResponse.p: Use the reason code shown in the message to determine the cause of the failure and take appropriate action to rectify the problem.
